description.text: [Description]: Defines JEUS authority check and related policies.

[Description]: Actions value to be passed to generator of resource permission class as selected value. [Value Description]: Actions data value to be passed to resource permission class. [Example]: <actions>boot,down</actions>
[Description]: Defines principal-role mapping on related Policy.
[Description]: Defines role-resource mapping on related Policy.
[Description]: Defines role-resource mappings on related Policy.
[Description]: Role being mapped with related Resource. [Value Description]: Role Name [Example]: <role>Administrator</role>
[Description]: Resource being mapped with Role. [Value Description]: Resource Name. [Example]: <resource>jeus.server.*</resource>

[Description]: Java class name inherited java.security.Permission. This class is used for resource permission. [Value Description]: Java Class name [Example]: <classname>jeus.security.resource.TimeConstrainedResourcePermission</classname>
[Description]: context id applied for role-resource mapping(This tag is not commonly used). [Value Description]: context id value [Example]: <context-id>MyContext</context-id>
[Description]: Defines principal-role mappings on the related Policy.
[Description]: If this tag exists, the related Resource will not be checked. (Access is allowed for everyone). [Value Description]: No value is not set. . empty Type.
[Description]: If this tag exists, the related Resource will be eliminated. (Access is not allowed for anyone). [Value Description]: For this field, No value is set. Empty type.
